scripts.build: npm run test && uglifyjs build/vega-projection.js -c -m -o build/vega-projection.min.js
scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g d3-array:d3,d3-contour:d3,d3-geo:d3 -f umd -n vega -o build/vega-projection.js -- index.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && zip -j build/vega-projection.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/vega-projection.js build/vega-projection.min.js
